metadata.title: Classy Brass Pill Box - Decorative Pill Case with Gift Box - Carry Your Meds in Style (Rectangular)
features: Decorative pill box by Houder. Carry your pills in style.
Perfect pill case for the purse or pocket. Measures 2.25"L x 1.5"W x .60"H
Internal divider keeps your pills organized.
Comes in easy to wrap gift box. Gift wrap options also available at checkout.
Unique gift for men or women.
description: This decorative pill box from Houder is the stylish way to carry your essential medications or vitamins. Perfect for the pocket or the purse, Houder designer pill boxes will add a touch of style to your life. This is the perfect combination of function and fashion.
